party_rules.title: Party rules
party_rules.content_0: Anyone who plays football is encouraged to join the party. It doesn't matter who scores or concedes üòÅ
party_rules.title_1: Respect the inviter ‚Äì respect the return invite
party_rules.content_1: If someone brings beer, others bring food. We are fair and loyal!
party_rules.title_2: No leaving until drunk (unless your wife calls üòÖ)
party_rules.content_2: But if you're drunk, someone must take care of you ‚Äì no one drinks alone.
party_rules.title_3: Lose and drink away sadness ‚Äì Win and drink to celebrate
party_rules.content_3: Whatever the result, we stay happy and united. That‚Äôs the real victory.
party_rules.title_4: On the table we‚Äôre teammates ‚Äì Off the table we‚Äôre brothers
party_rules.content_4: No talking about losses ‚Äì only fun. Absolutely no arguing or harsh words when tipsy.
party_rules.title_5: Don‚Äôt talk about absent members at the party
party_rules.content_5: If someone isn‚Äôt here, talk to them next time. No gossip behind their back!
party_rules.title_6: Drink with heart ‚Äì Wash with honor
party_rules.content_6: Latecomers help clean. Early leavers wash first. No help = no vote for food next time üòé
party_rules.title_7: Singing needs music ‚Äì Drinking needs joy
party_rules.content_7: Bring speakers, guitars, and your voice! Show your passion ‚Äì no judging!
party_rules.content_8: Drink responsibly. Never drive yourself home after drinking. Someone always drives you home.
party_rules.title_9: Pay on time ‚Äì Party with joy
party_rules.content_9: Every party has a fund. Pay on time, pay fully ‚Äì lasting drinks, lasting bond.
